participant_1.name: Alex Johnson
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and empathetic, loves engaging with people and helping others.
participant_1.background: I'd be a terrible soldier if I were blind. I love that my job allows me to help animals in need. I've managed to manage my diabetes well enough to become a bartender. I drive a Ford Taurus. I am a vegetarian who is concerned about my father's health.

participant_2.name: Michael Smith
participant_2.personality: Family-oriented and cheerful, enjoys sharing experiences and creating memories with loved ones.
participant_2.background: I crashed my favorite RC car into a tree. I married Miss USA. My life's goal is to be the world's foremost encyclopedia salesman. I like to vote. I am a family person who enjoys watching Netflix in my spare time.

content.text: Pretty good. Just got back from work. I'm a bartender.
Oh cool! I've always been curious about being a bartender. Do you like it?
Yeah, I love it! I get to talk to people all day and I get free drinks. What do you do for work?
I'm a stay at home mom. I'm married to Miss USA!
That's awesome! How did you meet her?
We met at a charity event. She was doing a modeling gig and I was working security.
That's so cool! What's she like?
She's amazing! She's so beautiful and kind. She's also really smart.
That's awesome! I'm happy for you.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to watch Netflix, go to the beach, and hang out with my family.
Sounds fun! I like to do those things too.
I'm sure we'd be great friends!
